00193    /*
00194    * Serialize to/from an archive. 
00195    */
00196    template <class Archive>
00197    void StructureFactorP::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00198    {
00199       if (!isInitialized_) {
00200          UTIL_THROW("Error: Object not initialized.");
00201       }
00202       ar & structureFactors_;
00203       ar & fourierModes_;
00204       ar & nSample_;
00205 
00206       serializeCheck(ar, nAtomType_, "nAtomType");
00207       serializeCheck(ar, nAtomTypeIdPair_, "nAtomTypeIdPair");
00208       serializeCheck(ar, nWave_, "nWave");
00209       for (int i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00210          serializeCheck(ar, waveIntVectors_[i], "waveIntVector");
00211       }
00212    }
